summary: A veteran cop chases a cold blooded serial killer, who murders his victims in alphabetical order.
cast: Mohanlal|Priyamani|Babu Antony|Arjun Nandakumar|Anoop Menon|Roma Asrani|Devan|Riyaz Khan|Mithra Kurian|Manikuttan|Ambika Mohan|Rajshri Nair|Narain|Seetha|Siddique|Jagathi Sreekumar|Sreelekshmi
title: Grandmaster
